ValidationRule.description: All the fields within the Problem Resolution section are required prior to updated the "Problem Status" field to "Closed".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Problem_Status__c, "Closed"), ISBLANK( Root_Cause__c ) || ISBLANK( Resolution_Detail__c ) || ISBLANK( Future_Monitoring_Method__c ) || ISBLANK( Expected_Resolution_Date__c ) || ISBLANK( RFC_Release_to_Resolve_Problem__c ) || ISBLANK( RFC_Closure_Date__c ) || ISBLANK( URL_Link_to_Product_Change__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All the fields within the Problem Resolution section are required prior to updated the "Problem Status" field to "Closed".
